name: SONARFISH
description:
in SONARFISH,

a submission to the "Two Colors" One Button Game Jam,

you are a blind fish who uses echolocation to detect predators and prey.

instructions:

* movement automatically follows mouse cursor

* press any button to ping your sonar

* avoid big scary anglerfish

* eat smaller fish

* survive as long as you can

* bar represents your time left before starvation

* orb next to bar indicates how long before you can sonar again

made with ♥ & Godot Engine (https://godotengine.org/license)

design: Fishies & Echo

production: Fishies

programming: Fishies

art: Echo

audio: Freesound.org, Mixkit.co
